attributes.action: Recommend Christians continue to provide children valuable foster care alternatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently a christian minister and his wife resigned from providing foster care.
This was due to authorities ordering this couple to take children to sex education classes if Instructed.
This couple have served the community well, for years but stated they would not take any child to any sex education, no matter the orientation of the child.
They offer a non sexual, non discrimanatory service for all they cared for & would continue if the authorities ceased from "Bullying"
